sentences.english: Its fragrant scent will give you unlimited imagination.
sentences.chinese: 她将赋予您馥郁的芬芳令人悠然上神往。

sentences.english: They saw Longjing tea is pure and fragrant and has a sweetish and mellow taste.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为龙井茶色泽翠绿，香气馥郁，甘醇爽口。

sentences.english: Juicy, rich and youthful, offering smoky blueberry and spice scents.
sentences.chinese: 馥郁醇香，充满活力，散发出蓝莓的熏香及辛香气息。

sentences.english: The resulting wines are soft and flavorsome.
sentences.chinese: 产出的葡萄酒入口柔软，香气馥郁。

sentences.english: An aromatic nose of ripened fruits, closing with hints of oak.
sentences.chinese: 馥郁的果香芬芳宜人，蕴含几分橡木的淡淡余韵。

sentences.english: After choking taste rich subtle detail, fruity fragrance, fresh and a long finish.
sentences.chinese: 入喉后口感丰厚微妙细致，果味馥郁，余味新鲜悠长。

sentences.english: There came through the open door the heavy scent of the lilac.
sentences.chinese: 从敞开的房门飘来了紫丁香馥郁的香气。

sentences.english: The aspic is one kind of strongly fragrant purple blue color floret.
sentences.chinese: 薰衣草是一种馥郁的紫蓝色的小花。

sentences.english: The suit exudes a faint charming rose scent.
sentences.chinese: 这套衣服微微散发一种馥郁的玫瑰香。

sentences.english: Fragrant fruit juice is the best drink to entertain guests in the four seasons.
sentences.chinese: 香气馥郁的果露饮料是四季酬宾美物。

sentences.english: Which like a canker in the fragrant rose.
sentences.chinese: 恰像馥郁的玫瑰花心的毛虫。

sentences.english: The lavandula spica is one kind of strongly fragrant indigo blue floret.
sentences.chinese: 熏衣草是一种馥郁的紫蓝色的小花。

sentences.english: Cold seeps into the floral fragrance line, submerged.
sentences.chinese: 一线冷泉把馥郁的花香，淹没。

sentences.english: Fine elegant and typical Pinot Grigio bouquet.
sentences.chinese: 芳香馥郁，具有典型的灰皮诺葡萄的果香。

sentences.english: It is deep and dark with rich aromas of black cherry and subtle notes of vanilla and earthiness.
sentences.chinese: 馥郁的黑樱桃香味和微妙的香草与土质的结合。

sentences.english: To fully appreciate its delicate fragrance and its aromas lingered in your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 以充分领略其清香馥郁，唇齿留香的感觉。

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
